title: With the new Lux e thing, should Ali's combo work the same?
body:
It just got me thinking, this would make it alot easier for people to pick up Alister.  I'm not sure if that's what they want, but to me it seems like similar reasoning would apply.

Or would this make them nerf Ali?  :D

replies.body: It already works like that. You cast Pulverize after the head butt is in motion and before arriving at the target.

> [{quoted}](name=Skia Asteri,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Y37BHTIU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-20T16:56:11.573+0000)

Hah!  When did they do that one?  I wonder how long I've been doing the unnecessarily hard and less reliable version :D
